World.title: Far-right politician prompts fury with burqa antics in Australian parliament

World.title: Bollywood's 'He-Man' Dharmendra dies at 89

World.title: No, there is no ceasefire in Gaza
World.description: Israel’s bombing of Gaza is not a ‘violation of the ceasefire'. It is a continuing genocide under diplomatic cover.

World.title: Over 250 children still missing in Nigeria after being abducted from Catholic school
World.description: More than 250 children are still being held by kidnappers in central Nigeria after they were abducted Friday from a Catholic boarding school.

World.title: US plan to stop Ukraine war is “not reasonable”

World.title: A tale of two Chinas: Tech industry booms as workers face dim prospects

World.title: Ukrainians express concerns about a peace plan drafted by the U.S. and Russia
World.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was given a Thursday deadline to accept a new peace plan drafted by the U.S. and Russia that Ukraine had no input in, causing concerns for residents.

World.title: COP30 ends with agreement on adaptation funding but no mention of fossil fuels
